title: UI for preference rollout
body:
We'll need a UI to create preference rollout recipes. Note that this is going to be implemented as a "local action" in the normandy client. See [bug 1440782](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1440782) for more info.

This will likely have to wait until the local action is speced out so we know what arguments will be needed

### [Preference roll-out blueprint](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qFCOscDiMGVDcBYtznzgPNCWzOhaxC4X5VGt3LTjZY0/edit#heading=h.eoqr3si0tn8z)
